title: virtual networks connected
extract: The Virtual Network Connection. The Virtual Network Connection (VNC) is a platform-independent application that allows remote access to another computer. Using computers installed with VNC gives administrators the ability to view and interact with computers over a network or the Internet.
extract_html: The Virtual Network Connection. The Virtual Network Connection (VNC) is a platform-independent application that allows remote access to another computer. Using computers installed with VNC gives administrators the ability to view and interact with computers over a network or the Internet.
